summary: Marshal Calem Ware (Randolph Scott) must face unpleasant facts about his past when he attempts to run a criminal gang out of town.
cast: Randolph Scott|Angela Lansbury|Warner Anderson|Jean Parker|Wallace Ford|John Emery|James Bell|Ruth Donnelly|Michael Pate|Don Megowan|Jeanette Nolan|Victor Adamson|Harry Antrim|Stanley Blystone|Rudy Bowman|Barry Brooks|George Bruggeman|Bob Burns|Don Carlos|John Cason|Edwin Chandler|G. Pat Collins|Hal K. Dawson|George DeNormand|Richard Farnsworth|Franklyn Farnum|Frank Ferguson|Duke Fishman|Charles Fogel|Kay Garrett|Leonard P. Geer|Augie Gomez|Frank Hagney|Sam Harris|Reed Howes|Jack Kenny|Ethan Laidlaw|Mike Lally|Jay Lawrence|Kermit Maynard|Philo McCullough|Frank Mills|Frank O'Connor|Artie Ortego|Peter Ortiz|Jack Parker|Jack Perrin|Frank J. Scannell|Jerry Schumacher|Guy Teague|Jack Tornek|Harry Tyler|Wally West|Charles Williams
title: La ciudad sin ley
